original_text: He took Peter and the two sons of Zebedee along with him, and he began to be sorrowful and troubled.
korean_text: 베드로와 세베대의 두 아들을 데리고 가실새 고민하고 슬퍼하사

sentences.original_text: He took Peter and the two sons of Zebedee along with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 베드로와 세베대의 두 아들을 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and he began to be sorrowful
